data.actual_result: The NSFW is still present, even after a reload
data.expected_result: The NSFW warning shouldn't be present because you agreed to it on the overlay
data.short_description: Agreeing to a NSFW channel on the overlay doesn't agree in the desktop client
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the overlay - Navigate to a channel that will present you with a NSFW warning - Agree to the warning on the overlay - Observe the channel on desktop
